title: Validated Summary (VS) data from New Horizons SWAP instrument - David J. McComas (Princeton)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/new-horizons/swap/validsum/2008/new_horizons_swap_validsum_20081010210700_v1.0.11.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 40.4762% of the 159048 timesteps. Cadence = 640000007000 [ns] = PT640.000007S.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Start UTC time of the coarse-fine energy sweep used to determine the solar wind parameters.

parameters.name: st_utc
parameters.description: The start UTC time of the coarse-fine energy sweep used to determine the solar wind parameters. (No Plot)
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Start Time (UTC)

parameters.name: sp_utc
parameters.description: The stop UTC time of the coarse-fine energy sweep used to determine the solar wind parameters. (No plot)
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Stop Time (UTC)

parameters.name: st_met
parameters.description: Start MET time of the coarse-fine energy sweep used to determine the solar wind parameters.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Start Time (MET)

parameters.name: sp_met
parameters.description: Stop MET time of the coarse-fine energy sweep used to determine the solar wind parameters.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Stop Time (MET)

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: Solar wind proton density in units of cm^-3.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Solar Wind Proton Density

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Solar wind proton speed in units of km/s.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Solar Wind Proton Speed

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Solar wind proton temperature in units of K.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Solar Wind Proton Temperature

parameters.name: pdyn
parameters.description: Solar wind proton dynamic pressure in units of nPa.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Solar Wind Proton Dynamic Pressure

parameters.name: pth
parameters.description: Solar wind thermal dynamic pressure in units of pPa.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Solar Wind Proton Thermal Pressure

parameters.name: NH_HGI_D_X
parameters.description: X component of the center of the spacecraft position in HGI coordinates in units of AU.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: X component of the spacecraft position in Heliographic Inertial coordinates

parameters.name: NH_HGI_D_Y
parameters.description: Y component of the center of the NH spacecraft position in HGI coordinates in units of AU.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Y component of the spacecraft position in Heliographic Inertial coordinates

parameters.name: NH_HGI_D_Z
parameters.description: Z component of the center of the spacecraft position in HGI coordinates in units of AU.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Z component of the spacecraft position in Heliographic Inertial coordinates

parameters.name: NH_HGI_D_LAT
parameters.description: Latitude of the center of the NH spacecraft position in HGI coordinates in degrees.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Latitude of the spacecraft in Heliographic Inertial coordinates

parameters.name: NH_HGI_D_R
parameters.description: Distance to the center of the NH spacecraft position from the center of the HGI coordinate system (Sun) in units of AU.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Distance of the spacecraft in Heliographic Inertial coordinates

parameters.name: NH_HGI_D_LON
parameters.description: Longitude of the center of the NH spacecraft position in HGI coordinates in degrees.
parameters.x_cdf_FIELDNAM: NH SWAP: Longitude of the spacecraft in Heliographic Inertial coordinates
